titleStmt.title: JRC-ACQUIS 31985R1554 English

Council Regulation (EEC) No 1554/85 of 4 June 1985 on the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the Republic of Seychelles on fishing off Seychelles

notesStmt.note: Only European Community legislation printed in the paper edition of the Official Journal of the European Union is deemed authentic.

body.head: Council Regulation (EEC) No 1554/85 of 4 June 1985 on the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the Republic of Seychelles on fishing off Seychelles
body.p: on the conclusion of the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the Republic of Seychelles on fishing off Seychelles
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Economic Community, and in particular Article 43 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Having regard to the opinion of the European Parliament (1),

Whereas it is in the Community's interests to approve the Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the Republic of Seychelles on fishing off Seychelles, signed in Brussels on 23 May 1985,
The Agreement between the European Economic Community and the Government of the Republic of Seychelles on fishing off Seychelles is hereby approved on behalf of the Community.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this Regulation.
The President of the Council shall give the notification provided for in Article 14 of the Agreement (2).
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
(2) The date of the entry into force of the Agreement will be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities by the General Secretariat of the Council.
ON THE CONCLUSION OF THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY AND THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF SEYCHELLES ON FISHING OFF SEYCHELLES
HAVING REGARD TO THE TREATY ESTABLISHING THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY, AND IN PARTICULAR ARTICLE 43 THEREOF,
HAVING REGARD TO THE PROPOSAL FROM THE COMMISSION,
HAVING REGARD TO THE OPINION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT ( 1 ),

WHEREAS IT IS IN THE COMMUNITY'S INTERESTS TO APPROVE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY AND THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF SEYCHELLES ON FISHING OFF SEYCHELLES, SIGNED IN BRUSSELS ON 23 MAY 1985,
THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE EUROPEAN ECONOMIC COMMUNITY AND THE GOVERNMENT OF THE REPUBLIC OF SEYCHELLES ON FISHING OFF SEYCHELLES IS HEREBY APPROVED ON BEHALF OF THE COMMUNITY .
THE TEXT OF THE AGREEMENT IS ATTACHED TO THIS REGULATION .
THE PRESIDENT OF THE COUNCIL SHALL GIVE THE NOTIFICATION PROVIDED FOR IN ARTICLE 14 OF THE AGREEMENT ( 2 ).
THIS REGULATION SHALL ENTER INTO FORCE ON THE THIRD DAY FOLLOWING ITS PUBLICATION IN THE OFFICIAL JOURNAL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES .
THIS REGULATION SHALL BE BINDING IN ITS ENTIRETY AND DIRECTLY APPLICABLE IN ALL MEMBER STATES .
( 2 ) THE DATE OF THE ENTRY INTO FORCE OF THE AGREEMENT WILL BE PUBLISHED IN THE OFFICIAL JOURNAL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES BY THE GENERAL SECRETARIAT OF THE COUNCIL .
